code: import{v4}from"uuid";export var SET_ALERT='SET_ALERT';export var REMOVE_ALERT='REMOVE_ALERT';export var setAlert=function setAlert(message,color){return function(dispatch){var id=v4();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,payload:{message:message,color:color,id:id}});setTimeout(function(){dispatch(removeAlert(id));},3000);};};export var removeAlert=function removeAlert(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT,payload:{id:id}});};};
